BatchJobPartFailedRecord.name: BatchJobPartFailedRecord
BatchJobPartFailedRecord.description: Represents records that a batch job part couldn't successfully process.

BatchJobId.description: The unique identifier of the associated batch job.

BatchJobPartId.description: The unique identifier of the associated batch job part.

ErrorDescription.description: The error message that indicates why the batch job part couldn't process the records.

Name.description: The name of the batch job part failed record.

Record.description: The unique identifier of the batch record that processed the failed records.

RecordName.description: The name of the record that's associated with the batch job part failed record.

ResubmittedBatchJobId.description: The batch job used to submit failed records. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the failed records. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.
